abstract: Shares in Groupon touched new lows on Wednesday, plummeting more than 5.5 percent and again raising questions about the viability of the daily deals site.
snippet: Shares in Groupon touched new lows on Wednesday, plummeting more than 5.5 percent and again raising questions about the viability of the daily deals site.

headline.main: Groupon Shares Hit New Low in Latest Plunge

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
